text: Zabryna Guevara (born January 12, 1972) is an American television and theater actress. She is known for playing the role of Melania Ortiz in 3 lbs and Sarah Essen in Gotham. She is also known for her stage role as Yazmin in Water by the Spoonful, an award-winning play by Quiara Alegr√≠a Hudes, at the Second Stage Theater in New York City. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors
title: Zabryna Guevara
